scripts.tar: tar -zcf - deploy.sh |openssl des3 -salt -k ${private_key} | dd of=deploy.sh.des3;tar -zcf - taox.pub |openssl des3 -salt -k ${private_key} | dd of=taox.pub.des3
scripts.untar: dd if=deploy.sh.des3 |openssl des3 -d -k ${private_key} | tar zxf -;dd if=taox.pub.des3 |openssl des3 -d -k ${private_key} | tar zxf -
